definition: to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive

sentences.english: Grass will wither and flowers will fall . But the Word of the Lord will remain forever.
sentences.chinese: 草必枯干，花必凋谢，惟有主的道是永存的。

sentences.english: Your reality is only spirit. Therefore you are in a state of grace forever.
sentences.chinese: 你的实相是纯粹属灵的，因此你永存于恩典之境。

sentences.english: Where there is persevere in putting people first, where is the guarantee of the eternal life of architectural decoration industry.
sentences.chinese: 坚持以人为本是建筑装饰装修业生命永存的所在。

sentences.english: She who sends energy to the matrix that perpetuates the reality in which souls may manifest.
sentences.chinese: 向矩阵传送能量的她使灵魂可以显现的实相永存。

sentences.english: Although he is no longer with us, his legacy will live on forever.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他不再与我们同在，他的遗志将永存后世。

sentences.english: And he built his sanctuary like high palaces, like the earth which he hath established for ever.
sentences.chinese: 盖造他的圣所，好像高峰，又像他建立永存之地。

sentences.english: Because, it is only death that perpetuates human love and beauty, which are both mortal.
sentences.chinese: 要让人类有限的爱和美永存，就只有死。

sentences.english: When we hungry…love will keep us alive.
sentences.chinese: 当我们无辛的时候，爱让我们永存。

sentences.english: My heart is drenched in wine, but you'll be on my mind forever.
sentences.chinese: 我的心浸没在酒中，但你将永存于我心中。

sentences.english: A life force indwells in nature.
sentences.chinese: 生命力永存于大自然中。

sentences.english: Objective To study surgical treatment of large-scale congenital persistent pupillary membrane.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨先天性较大范围永存瞳孔膜的手术治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the surgical results of truncus arteriosus in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结儿童永存动脉干外科治疗经验。

sentences.english: The principles of the Paris Commune are eternal.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎公社的原则是永存的。

sentences.english: Grace will last, beauty will blast.
sentences.chinese: 美貌会枯蒌，优雅将永存。

sentences.english: She wrote a book on the Paris Commune .
sentences.chinese: 巴黎公社的原则是永存的。

definition: eternal/everlasting/fig. to pass into eternity (i.e. to die)
lit. although dead, as if still alive (idiom); still with us in spirit
to live forever/eternal life/all one's life
